instruction: Create a poem using the theme 'the beauty of nature.'
output:
The beauty of nature paints my eyes
The way the trees whisper the wind's sighs
The rolling hills mix with the sky so blue
In awe, I stand and wonder what nature could do

The life of wildlife gives hope anew
Letting us know in nature, all things are few
I don't need gold and silver to be happy
When I take a walk around, I can't help but be sappy

I bask in the beauty of nature's stir
Rivers, forests, and meadows, together we blur
The birds soaring above make me feel lighter
As the sun sets, I am mesmerized even brighter

Nature is the beauty I never ignore
The world is bigger and I'm so much more
Connected by the love of the beauty of nature
It's a treasure so precious and a sight to remember.
